section.name: 6. Aggregate Functions
section.p: Demonstrates how to use "derived" DbEntities for SQL aggregate functions, such as MIN, MAX, COUNT. This example is runnable from command line.
section.panel: With introduction of SQLTemplate this example should be considered deprecated, as derived DbEntities are very limited by nature.

subsection.name: 6.1 Building Example
subsection.p: Follow generic instructions for building examples. (Important!) Before the build, edit "default.properties" file, setting "driver.jar" property to the location of the JAR file of the JDBC driver.
